result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jeremy T Gruener not in court.  Attorney Larry R Pruden in court for Jeremy T Gruener.  Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. If no resolution, case to be set for trial. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Jeremy T Gruener not in court. State of Wisconsin in Court by ADA Samuel Berg. Called - no appearances. Record by Atty. Berg that the State has not determined if they will be charging defendant on the new referral. Pending matters (22CM197 and 22CM355) are assigned to Judge Drettwan and scheduled for October 10, 2022 @ 1:15 p.m. Court sets this matter to the same date. Court in recess.
Signed bond filed with the court.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

BOND MUST BE SIGNED BY 8/26/2022 AT 5PM

BOND TO COVER 22CM355 & 22CM197

Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): T.A.G. dob 6/11/1969. Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Any prescribed medication is to be taken within the terms / limits of the prescription. Defendant must maintain absolute sobriety. Defendant MUST COMPLY with PRE-TRIAL SERVICES. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Jeremy T Gruener not in court.  Attorney Larry R Pruden in court for Jeremy T Gruener.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. Not guilty plea entered by counsel and trial reserved. Total Bond must be signed by 8/26/2022 at 5 pm. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jeremy T Gruener
Current: W5925 Mariner Hills Tr., Elkhorn, WI 53121 United States  (Effective: 08-05-2022)
Prior: 13339 Hospitality Ct, Sturtevant, WI 53177

Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jeremy T Gruener not in court. Attorney Larry Pruden not available. Minutes filed.
Initial appearance scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
